name: Twitchiness
description:
Twitchiness is a walking simulator game that features an antisocial character's daily life being outside in a social environment. The player controls this character to go through the experience together while attempting to calm him down from his twitchiness before he finally arrives back to his isolated comfort zone to enjoy his favorite entertainment, Twitch...

How to play:
  • Press and hold "A" or "D" to move Left or Right respectively.
  • When Stress Level is higher than 2, click on the Red Circles in the "Stress Relieve Area" to lower the Current Stress by 2.
  • Don't let the Current Stress go higher than 100%!!

Questionnaire (Feedback from your experience)
